post.body: I have an external hard drive. And before I got that I burned huge cds full of photos but the HD is much more convenient.
And i'm sure you are in VERY good company.
I can't wait to see it!!!
6pm.com
dont go! jk. way to skip work and/or leave to go to an appointment after only 2 days back on the job.
Is headed home cuz she feels like this: http://tinyurl.com/95cvrs
Today is my baby brother's 26th birthday! Happy Birthday Jack! I love you like a brother!
I have to go to CVS and buy more milk.
Off to meet Megan for burritos then art! Fantastic Friday night!
Headed home by way of the grocery for catfood and weekend sustenance... Maybe some studio cleaning & an art opening later - time will tell!
HAPpy new year!
SNOW DAY! i get to spend it getting ready for our NYE party! Happy last day of 2008!
New product idea: Cool Ranch Tootsie Rolls. You can thank my boyfriend for that disgusting IMAGINARY abomination. Thanks Mark.
Kind of ridiculously bored. Not really sure how to function after the RUSH RUSH RUSH of the past month + holidays. Cats are snoozin!
Just dropped my boots off for new heels. I miss them already! :(
Holy sheets I'm going to Ireland.
Today: Work, post office, cobbler, WholeFoods. Cobbler!? Yeah. My boots need new bottoms! That's possible, right?
The sky over boston is lovely this morning.
I'm so sleepy and it's only 9:18. What the hell. Belly full of pasta maybe? Damnit. I need to pack order and harass the cats to wake up!
The office is FREEZING. Wrist warmers, neck warmer, sweater all on but I REFUSE to don my coat! Boo electricians and their open doors!
